tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: The pitch of the song had to be altered to avoid the blocking/deletion of this video due to copyright infringements. If you post the video with original pitch, YouTube﻿ would block the video because large music companies placed copyrights on the music.
That﻿ was funny when she punched prince charming!
its not the real music﻿ vevo look for katy perry music

Katy is awesome!
I made a goofy clip for her! Basically to make her smile! Check it out here:﻿ watch?v=pnzrZ9n4EFQ or on my channel, if you got a minute.
Please share, if you like it :o) thanks!
2:33 is﻿ THE BEST PART

SuperGeneralITv: Wenn du keine Ahnung hast, verschone die Welt﻿ Bitte mit deinen sinnlosen Tiraden. Freimaurersymbole sind weder krank noch irgendwas anderes an dieser Vereinigung ist absolut nichts auszusetzen und wenn du dich mit denen nicht auskennst dann lass die kindischen Bemerkungen. Es ist auch nicht alles gleich Satanistisch. Gothic hat mit Satan nichts zutun und Katy Perry bestimmt nicht. Also such dir ein Hobby und geh mal ab und zu an die Frische Luft..... Gutes Lied mal ganz nebenbei
leicht asynchron﻿
What bullshit.﻿ It's sped up
You should learn﻿ grammar
You're right but the person who uploaded this had to change the pitch or it would've been copyrighted﻿
wtf wheres the real voice of katy﻿ perry voice
@APOSTEL6 Ohhhhh.﻿
she sounds weird lol ﻿
1:00 Harry﻿ Potter und der Feuerkelch
Nur﻿ Satanismus und illuminten freimauersymbol einfach nur krank !

Tja, jemand der so kognitiv gestört ist, dass er immer und überall irgendwelche versteckten Botschaften sieht, wird wohl nicht verstehen, dass es überhaupt keinen Sinn macht, mit allen drei Vereinigungen gleichzeitig zu sympathisieren. Ach ja, Rechtschreibung und Grammatik sind nicht dazu erfunden worden, uns﻿ gleichzuschalten. Also hab keine Angst, diese zu benutzen.

2:40 it looks like katy was a hero :D﻿ superman:D
@absotwa true true this track is just OMG i love it AND.. you﻿ can use this to get this in mp3 => bit.ly/QQvHsL?=qfcel

better effects than dragonball evolutions. ﻿
